content: The House is gerrymandered. Red states use Jim Crow repression on voting. Politics is owned by the 1%. Gorsuch is guaranteed to keep that status quo that also put Bush in the White House. 5–4 will be permanent. All 5 are young. If McConnell can so easily steal the Supreme Court what is democracy? Either fight it now or be prepared for Session’s tanks rolling through your homes and using private prisons to keep you quiet.
